value.verse: Is it nothing to you, all you who pass by? *
value.halfverse: Look and see if there is any sorrow like my sorrow,

value.verse: For these things I weep; my eyes flow with tears, *
value.halfverse: for a comforter is far from me, one to revive my courage.

value.verse: Remember my affliction and my bitterness, *
The steadfast love of God never ceases, *
“God is my portion,” says my soul, *

value.halfverse: for the coming of God’s salvation.
value.verse: It is good that we should wait quietly *
